keywordspec.name: Dialogs
keywordspec.doc: A test library providing dialogs for interacting with users.``Dialogs`` is Robot Framework's standard library that provides meansfor pausing the test execution and getting input from users. Thedialogs are slightly different depending on whether tests are run onPython, IronPython or Jython but they provide the same functionality.Long lines in the provided messages are wrapped automatically sinceRobot Framework 2.8. If you want to wrap lines manually, you can addnewlines using the ``\n`` character sequence.The library has a known limitation that it cannot be used with timeoutson Python. Support for IronPython was added in Robot Framework 2.9.2.

kw2.name: Execute Manual Step
kw2.doc: Pauses test execution until user sets the keyword status.User can press either ``PASS`` or ``FAIL`` button. In the latter case executionfails and an additional dialog is opened for defining the error message.``message`` is the instruction shown in the initial dialog and``default_error`` is the default value shown in the possible error messagedialog.

kw2.name: Get Selection From User
kw2.doc: Pauses test execution and asks user to select a value.The selected value is returned. Pressing ``Cancel`` fails the keyword.``message`` is the instruction shown in the dialog and ``values`` arethe options given to the user.Example:| ${username} = | Get Selection From User | Select user name | user1 | user2 | admin |
